name: Forest Retreat
short: A serene cabin tucked inside cedar forests.
description: Wake to birdsong and mist weaving through ancient trees. Sustainable cabins crafted from local materials, with trails that lead to hidden streams and viewpoints.

name: Mountain Lake
short: Crystal waters at the foot of snow peaks.
description: Glassy alpine waters reflecting indigo skies at dusk. Spend your evenings stargazing on a timber deck, mornings paddling into calm sunrise.

name: Desert Dunes
short: Amber dunes and velvet night skies.
description: Feel the desert breathe. Wind‑etched ridges glow gold at sunset; nights reveal constellations in pristine clarity.

name: Coastal Cliffs
description: Cliffside paths wind past secret beaches and aromatic groves. Mornings begin with salt air and gentle surf.
